the stigSite Owner
Posts: 325  Hi all I don’t know if you are were about Caerphilly byways and the damage that has been done there by someone in a digger on 3 different entrance so we have decided to post a petition and hand it in to Mr A Powell in Caerphilly council

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.  To the extent that it is a matter for central Government, it is a matter for the Assembly rather than Westminster.
